sentence.Network_en: Galactic surveys show that distant galaxies are not as evenly distributed in space as theory predicts.
sentence.Network_cn: 对银河系的研究表明，遥远星系在太空中的分布并不像理论所预言的那样均匀。

sentence.Network_en: Galactic nebulas are masses of diffuse material within our galaxy.
sentence.Network_cn: 银河星云是我们星系中的一团团弥散物.

sentence.Network_en: Astronomers usually assume that interstellar dust is closely confined to the galactic plane.
sentence.Network_cn: 天文学家通常认为,恒星际星尘都是紧靠着银河平面的.
